nodes.bodyText: This test shouldn't subclass JcaMgmtBase just to pick up some utility code. In a later comment I'll explain how to avoid that.

In the end this is a call to AbstractMgmtTestBase.executeOperation(operation, true) which is just a call to ManagementOperations.executeOperation(getModelControllerClient(), operation). So this is just ManagementOperations.executeOperation(managementClient.getControllerClient(), operation), which can be called directly.
